Uses of Interface
org.opengis.util.Type

Packages that use Type
Package
Description
org.apache.sis.util.iso
Implementations of GeoAPI types from the org.opengis.util package.
org.opengis.util
A set of base types from ISO 19103 which cannot be mapped directly from Java, plus utilities.

    Renamed DefaultRecordType.getFieldTypes() for consistency with the 2015 revision of ISO 19103 standard.
